name: Greek Island Hopping
summary: Start and end in Athens! With the Island Hopping tour Greek Island Hopping (Standard, 11 Days), you have a 11 days tour package taking you through Athens, Greece and 4 other destinations in Greece. Greek Island Hopping (Standard, 11 Days) includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
experience: You'll be living your best Greek island life on this sun, sea & culture-rich trip in Mykonos, Paros, Santorini, Ios & Athens. Stopping in at each of Greece's most popular islands, the perfect spot for buzzing party nights and lazy sun-soaked days, you'll have plenty of time to explore charming villages, local shops, volcanoes, natural coves & sun-soaked beaches, with plenty of time for sunbathing, swimming & nightlife as well as a bit of ancient history in between.

include.accomodation: 4 nights in Hotel, 2 nights in Contiki Special Stay
include.transport: All transfers between hotels & ferry ports during the trip

name: Get Social: Central Europe Highlights
summary: Start and end in London! With the Explorer tour Get Social: Central Europe Highlights (Winter) 2022-23, you have a 18 days tour package taking you through London, England and 12 other destinations in Europe. Get Social: Central Europe Highlights (Winter) 2022-23 includes accommodationin a hosteland campsites as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
experience: (Most similar to this previous trip: Winter Getaway) TRIP VIBE = fast-paced fun with tons of socialising, bucket-list sights and good times all round. Q: how do I fit Europe’s winter highlights into under three weeks? A: this, right here. Discover the foodie capitals of Berlin and Florence. Ooohh and ahhhh your way around the showstoppers: Paris, Rome, Venice and Amsterdam. Throw in the mind-blowing Alps. And top it off with all the steaming mulled wine, roaring fires, piping-hot pastries and frost-filled activities that makes a Euro winter so spesh. Got *chills*? You will do.

include.accomodation: 2 nights in hostels, 2 nights in bungalows at campsites
include.meals: 11 breakfasts, 2 dinners. This tour offers Vegetarian and Vegan food options on request. Simply let Topdeck know the food option that you prefer.

name: Pharaohs Nile Cruise Adventure
summary: Start and end in Cairo! With the In-depth Cultural tour Pharaohs Nile Cruise Adventure - 5 Star, you have a 8 days tour package taking you through Cairo, Egypt and 8 other destinations in Egypt. Pharaohs Nile Cruise Adventure - 5 Star includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
experience: Sail the majestic River Nile between Luxor and aswan onboard luxury nile cruises for 5 days. Enjoy the guided excursions with a professional Egyptologist daily.  As well as some delightful leisure activities.  Enjoy  the fabulous hospitality as you sail towards the historic sites along the Nile. Start the tour in Cairo with a must visit to the Pyramids at Giza Valley of the Kings. the famous sites along the Nile, Luxor and Karnak Temples.

include.accomodation: 3 nights in twin-share cabins onboard a luxury 5-star Luxury Nile Cruise Ship full board basis.

name: Southwest National Parks Grand Canyon Tour
summary: Start and end in Las Vegas! With the Explorer tour 7 day Southwest National Parks Grand Canyon Tour, you have a 7 days tour package taking you through Las Vegas, USA and 7 other destinations in USA. 7 day Southwest National Parks Grand Canyon Tour includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
experience: Enjoy our included overnight adventure in iconic Monument Valley, experience the real Wild Wild West, immerse yourselves in the amazing Utah landscapes of  Zion, Bryce, Arches and Canyonlands National Parks. Marvel at the world most famous slot Canyon - Antelope Canyon, visit Horshoe Bend and stare into the mysterious depths of the Grand Canyon before heading back to Fabulous Las Vegas!

include.accomodation: 3 nights hotel accommodation in 3 star hotels
include.meals: Meals are included per the local food kitty payment. Meals are not included with the Self Drive option other than 3 breakfasts.
include.transport: 14 Passenger mini bus minibus modern & spacious fully air conditioned with small group ticket type.

name: Spirits Of Vietnam - Hanoi / Halong Bay / Hoi An
summary: Start in Hanoi and end in Hoi An With the Explorer tour Spirits Of Vietnam - Hanoi / Halong Bay / Hoi An, you have a 3 days tour package taking you through Hanoi, Vietnam and 6 other destinations in Asia. Spirits Of Vietnam - Cambodia -Thailand - Hanoi / Halong Bay / Hoi An / Ho Chi Minh / Siem Reap / Phuket includes accommodation in a hotel as well as flights, an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
experience: The Spirits Of Vietnam gives travellers the best experience the three countries can offer. Start your journey in Hanoi, a beautiful city with French colonial buildings and a bustling atmosphere. Spend overnight on a cruise, be captivated by scenic Halong Bay, and head to the most romantic town in Vietnam - Hoi An, followed by 'Pearl of the Orient' - Ho Chi Minh. Then head to Siem Reap and visit the ancient capital of the Khmer Empire. Wrap up your adventures with a beach break at Thailand's largest island with its stunning sceneries and warm gentle sea. These wonders will amaze you and leave you speechless.

include.accomodation: 5-stars hotels, Hanoi: The Oriental Jade Hotel or similar, Halong Bay: Era  Cruise or similar, Hoi An : Palm Garden or similar
include.meals: This tour offers Jain, Vegetarian, Vegan and Halal food options on request. Simply let Realistic Asia know the food option that you prefer.
include.transport: Air-conditioned bus or private cars for the excursions

name: Ultimate Vietnam
summary: Start in Hanoi and end in Ho Chi Minh City! With the Explorer tour Ultimate Vietnam, you have a 14 days tour package taking you through Hanoi, Vietnam and 6 other destinations in Vietnam. Ultimate Vietnam includes accommodationin a hoteland hostel as well as flights, an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
experience: Explore SE Asia’s hidden gem! Mingle with the locals in Hanoi, wake up on a private island in Halong Bay, cook some delicious meals during our island cooking class, snorkel in crystal clear waters, walk down waterfalls and party in HCMC.

include.accomodation: 5-stars hotels, Hanoi: The Oriental Jade Hotel or similar, Halong Bay: Era  Cruise or similar, Hoi An : Palm Garden or similar
include.meals: This tour offers Jain, Vegetarian, Vegan and Halal food options on request. Simply let Realistic Asia know the food option that you prefer.
